roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
537 sq. ft. room, 110 sq. ft. terrace, floors 3-5, Blvd view

These rooms are adorned in Italian marble and custom accents, boasting floor-to-ceiling windows that lead to your very own 110 sq. ft. private terrace. Outfitted with a fully stocked, top shelf minibar and custom glassware, every detail exemplifies the extraordinary, down to the luxury amenities in your bathroom. In addition, our Crestron™ smart home system puts room service, lighting, drapes, and entertainment a mere tap away through our companion app on your in-room iPad.

Floors 3 through 5

Fully stocked, top shelf minibar with espresso machine

Bluetooth-enabled speakers in bathroom with guest input panel to accommodate all devices

Single bathroom with two basins, bathtub, separate shower and stocked with luxurious bathroom amenities

roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
696-775 sq. ft. suite, 241-303 sq. ft. terrace, floors 3-5, panoramic view

Invite the sparkling night sky into your suite from your private terrace through floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows. These Suites offer unobstructed views of Beverly Hills and stunning sunsets. Enjoy the added benefit of a separate living area, which means more than enough space to enjoy both inside and outside. Every suite features grand Italian marble entryway, a king-sized bed, a separate living room, and walk-in-closets with enough room to store outfits for every occasion.

Our Beverly Hills Suites offer every indulgence of our Corner Junior Suites, with the added privacy of a dressing area, a separate powder room, and extra space for entertaining. Starting at 1,093 sq. ft., these king-sized bed suites feature unobstructed views of sprawling cityscapes and stunning sunsets from your private, circular 445 sq. ft. terrace on the fourth through the 11th floor. Our king-sized bed Waldorf Suites start at 1,263 sq. ft. with more than enough space to entertain both in your lounge and outside, and offer the added privacy of a powder room separate from the master bath. roomTypes.name: Waldorf Penthouse Suite

roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
Spacious suites on 3rd floor, expansive terrace with 360 view

From 1,039 sq. ft. up to 1,640 sq. ft., each suite features a king-sized bed and a private dining room, with a circular terrace between 740 sq. ft. and 1,068 sq. ft. connecting your lounge through floor-to-ceiling windows. Enjoy a private dressing room, separate powder room and walk-in closets. Customize your stay with the companion app to your personal Crestron™ smart home system. Set the mood with lighting or music, adjust the thermostat and home theater system, or draw the drapes without leaving your bed through the provided iPad.

  • Fully stocked, top shelf minibar with espresso machine
  • Bluetooth-enabled speakers in bathroom with guest input panel to accommodate all devices
  • Powder room in addition to master bathroom and luxurious bathroom amenities

1,779 sq. ft., 513 sq. ft. terrace, penthouse floor, panoramic view

Wake up to urban vistas through floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows, with sunset views on the private 513 sq. ft. terrace connected to your bedroom. At 1,779 sq. ft., our Governor Suite has space to entertain in your lounge, dining room, or outside, and offers the privacy of a dressing room and powder room separate from the master bath. You'll have a workspace in the suite with fiber optic internet.

You'll be greeted by a grand Italian marble entryway with a king-sized bed and walk-in-closets.
